text:
Hi Guys, I have just created a dnd template from scratch and I noticed there is a *style.min.css* is attached to my template I am not sure from where its coming or how it's attached to my template,
anyone familiar with this? is that mandatory CSS I should use for every template?
if its not required, anyone help me to remove from my template? because of this CSS file I have to add *!important* tag for every basic elements
:wave: Riyas, do you have a link to the template you could DM me and I can try and take a look for you? Was this created through using the local development tools or from using the design manager?
